about_the_game:
"An Arcade Full of Cats: Timewarp Trouble" is an expansion for the base game "An Arcade Full of Cats", featuring Leo and Fofiño as they venture too deep into the past, encountering cats from Pre-history, the Victorian Age, and The Old West.



Your mission isn't just to search for lost cats; you'll also be running errands for cats from each era! Meet Joe, Louie, and Lybica - they'll be your guides throughout the Timewarp Trouble adventure.

Timewarp Trouble features...

New Time Eras: Dive into Pre-history, the Victorian Age, and The Old West, each with its unique challenges and adorable cats to rescue.

Time-Bending Tasks: Complete various errands for cats from different time periods, adding an exciting twist to your adventure.

Expanded Gameplay: Enjoy more cat-searching fun, unlock new achievements, and a brand new ending for the game!

Original Soundtrack: New original music.

Get ready to embark on a time-traveling quest like no other. "An Arcade Full of Cats: Timewarp Trouble" awaits your adventurous spirit! Uncover hidden feline friends, conquer challenging tasks, and rewrite cat history one era at a time.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any OS with x11 support
  • Processor: 1.3GHz or more, 64-bit
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB display memory
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card

short_description: Leo and Fofiño may have bitten off more than they can chew this time! Embark on an exciting journey through three brand-new scenarios in the latest expansion for "An Arcade Full of Cats".
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
